import getTitle from './stories';

<Meta title={getTitle()} />

## Carbon for Cloud & Cognitive

All [released components from Carbon for Cloud & Cognitive](https://ibm-cloud-cognitive.netlify.app/?path=/story/cloud-cognitive-released) come with any installation of Carbon for IBM Security. You can use them by doing the following in your project:

```js
import { CloudCognitive } from '@carbon/ibm-security';

function App() {
  return <CloudCognitive.AboutModal />;
}
```
